quotes.quote: Broken heart will turn into a stronger one within hope.
The emotion that can break your heart is sometimes the very one that heals it.
Envy hurt exponentially more than heartbreak because your soul was torn in two, half soaring with happiness for another person, half mired in a well of selfpity and pain.
No matter how hard your heart is broken, the world doesn't stop for your grief."
Learning from other people's mistakes is better than making your owns. And it is easier to live lonely than to have a broken heart.
I don't want to break someone's heart, but you can't control that. A broken heart happens; that's inevitable.
I guess when your heart gets broken, you sort of start to see the cracks in everything.
As the light begins to intensify, so does my misery, and I wonder how it is possible to hurt so much when nothing is wrong
His broken heart was unfeeling, like shattered glass in an acid bath.
Heartbreak could be lived with if it weren't accompanied by regret.
You know, a heart can be broken, but it keeps on beating, just the same.
There are a million ways to lose someone you love.
They are many wounded hearts here. Many! Some admit. Others - the stubborn ones, scribble poetry instead.
When trees burn, they leave the smell of heartbreak in the air.
I have a good imagination. Look, I know what it feels like to have a broken heart. I know what it feels like to feel something for somebody. I'm just too weird to be in a relationship.
You find out what you are made of when you have a broken heart. If it happens early and often, all the better.
Every happy girl has a broken heart. But every broken heart girl is not happy
You may have a broken heart, but you may find someone else.
The heart will break, but broken live on.
This is what it felt like to have a broken heart. It felt less like a cracking down the middle and more like she had swallowed it whole and it sat bruised and bleeding in the pit of her stomach.
Love can sometimes be magic. But magic can sometimes just be an illusion.
No matter how bad your heart is broken, the world doesn't stop for your grief.
Throughout my lifetime I've left pieces of my heart here and there. And now, there's almost barely enough to stay alive. But I force a smile, knowing that my ambition far exceeded my talent.
Ever has it been that loves knows not its own death until the hour of separation.
Broken hearts don't need medical treatment, they need a lover to mend them.
A broken heart is just the growing pains necessary so that you can love more completely when the real thing comes along.
Heaven doesn't ignore cries of a broken heart.
I know my heart will never be the same but I'm telling myself I'll be okay
She went around with a broken heart, and she wasn't sure who'd broken it. She thought it was herself, mostly.
The past can't hurt you anymore, not unless you let it.
Then his heart, now broken into a thousand pieces, slowly began to turn to ice.
